üßç‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Garment Structure

The kit consists of a short basketball jersey and tapered mid-thigh athletic shorts. The jersey features a crew, angular shoulder seams, and a form-fitting streamlined cut through the torso. The shorts include sculpted side panels, a reinforced waistband, and slit hems for dynamic movement.

‚∏ª

üßµ Fabric & Texture

Sleeve cuffs are trimmed in crimson red with subtle dotted patterns near the hem.

The back of the jersey includes a crimson red vertical spine pattern, composed of interlocking bands. A deep custom #9900ff shade halo gradient behind the number adds tonal contrast.

The left thigh displays a crimson red team crest; the right thigh features an optional player number or minimal icon.
